description: The Après Ski 1/4 is designed for just that; A cozy Merino/Cashmere, thick sweater that's soft and warm, after a day on the slopes. It's a stylish, warm piece that's perfect for an après ski drink paired with your jeans or ski pants.
name: We Norwegians Apres Ski Pullover - Mens

specs.value: Fits generous - they suggest to size down
